Price-related notice

Why pricing is important and why offering free access can be beneficial.

Balancing Accessibility and Sustainability

Offering free access ensures that all students can benefit from essential resources without financial constraints.

Encouraging Widespread Use

Providing core features for free encourages widespread adoption and use of the platform

Supporting Development and Maintenance

While basic features are free, pricing for advanced features supports the ongoing development and maintenance of the platform.

Enabling Premium Features

Pricing allows us to offer premium features and advanced tools that enhance the user experience.

Ensuring Quality and Innovation

A mix of free and priced plans ensures that everyone can access the essential tools while funding innovation and new features.

Creating Fair and Flexible Options

Free access to fundamental features provides equitable opportunities for all users, while pricing for additional features offers flexibility and choice based on individual needs and budgets.

Pricing FAQs

If you have queries about our pricing options, you're in the right place.

Are all features of Off-Topics free?

Yes, most features are available for free to all students. However, some advanced features may require a subscription.

What do I get with the Basic plan?

The Basic plan offers access to essential features, including basic resources and support.

What additional benefits does the Standard plan provide?

The Standard plan includes more resources, enhanced support, and additional tools to help with your studies.

What is included in the Premium plan?

The Premium plan offers the most comprehensive features, including priority support, exclusive resources, and advanced tools.

Why do we have a pricing structure if many features are free?

The pricing helps support ongoing development and improvements, ensuring that we can continue offering and enhancing our services.
